def main():
    n = int(input())
    a = input()
    f = list(map(int, input().split()))
    b = [str(f[int(x)-1]) for x in a]
    print(max(a, ''.join(b)))


if __name__ == "__main__":
    main()

def main():
    n = int(input())
    num = input()
    f = list(map(int, input().split()))
    first = max(num)
    first_count = num.count(first)
    second = str(f.index(int(first))+1)
    if first_count == 1:
        second = max(num.replace(first, second))

    print(num.replace(first, second))


if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()

#--------------------------------- SOLUTION ---------------------------------#

import re

def get_max_number(n, a, f):
  max_num = -1
  for i in range(n):
    for j in range(i+1, n+1):
      sub_string = a[i:j]
      sub_string_list = list(sub_string)
      for k in range(len(sub_string_list)):
        sub_string_list[k] = f[int(sub_string_list[k]) - 1]
      sub_string = ''.join(sub_string_list)
      if int(sub_string) > max_num:
        max_num = int(sub_string)
  return max_num

n = int(input())
a = input()
f = list(map(int, input().split()))
print(get_max_number(n, a, f))

#--------------------------------- SOLUTION ---------------------------------#
